title: Italy Wins Big Tennis Trophy Again!
summary: Flavio Cobolli is a tennis player from Italy who helped his team win the Davis Cup, a big tennis competition, for the third time in a row. He played very hard in a long match against Spain and won after being behind. His friend Matteo Berrettini also won his match. They have known each other since they were kids, and Berrettini used to babysit Cobolli and play tennis with him. Now, they are like brothers and won together for Italy. Cobolli said it was his dream to become a world champion, and he felt very happy. Italy is the first country to win three straight Davis Cup titles in over 50 years. Even though some top players were missing, Cobolli and Berrettini did a great job.

background_read: The Davis Cup is an international tennis competition where teams from different countries play against each other. It started a long time ago and is very famous. Players represent their country and try to win matches. Italy has a strong tennis team, and winning three times in a row is a big achievement because it hasn't happened for over 50 years. Flavio Cobolli and Matteo Berrettini are Italian tennis players who grew up together and now play as a team, showing how friendship can help in sports.

WHAT: They won the Davis Cup for the third time in a row by beating Spain
WHY: To achieve their dream of being world champions and show teamwork
